Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Description: Trade cards from the "Baseball Caramels" series (E90), issued 1909-11 by the American Caramel Company. There are three types of cards within the series. E90-1 cards depict players from across the American and National Leagues. E90-2 cards depict only players from Pittsburgh and E90-3 cards display players from Chicago.
